It should be noted that players do not actually have to kill any air elementals to complete Elemental Workshop I.

Monster ID1369

Air elementals are encountered during the Elemental Workshop I quest. As with all elementals, if players cast spells of the elemental's element, the spell will heal instead of damaging the elemental. It should be noted that players do not actually have to kill any air elementals to complete Elemental Workshop I.

Killing one is a requirement for an Easy Kandarin Diary task.
